title: Early social behaviour
creator_credit: Arnold Gesell, Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Yale Clinic of Child Development
brief_description: Shows the manifestation of the infant personality in a variety of social settings. Ten different children from 8 weeks to 7 years of age are studied and individual differences are emphasised. Also the social significance of the household is conveyed by scenes that reflect parent-child relationships.
